## tigris local logs

Shows logs from local Tigris instance

```
tigris local logs [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -f, --follow   follow logs output
  -h, --help     help for logs
```

### SEE ALSO

- [tigris local](tigris_local.md) - Starts and stops local development Tigris server
